website_summaries.verdict: A quality jacket with the ultimate in reflective elements, creating incredible visibility.
pros: Made entirely of reflective fabric, almost every element is visible in dim conditions, including the zipper
Works better as an athletic or cycling jacket than it does for causal use because of breathability

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is better than several flashing lights on your bike combined
customer_reviews.text: "Better than an air horn" was how a fellow cyclist described it. I have never felt more safe. This jacket is better than several flashing lights on your bike combined. Easily the most reflective thing on the road. My only complains are that even with the vents open it is stuffy and does not breathe well, leaving the rider pretty sweaty even on cool days, especially if one is carrying a back pack, and it is a little tight around the shoulders (get a larger size if in doubt). If it had a little more give around the shoulders and better cooling, either through a material change or more vent zips, it would be the perfect night time cycling jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Well made, very reflective, runs small
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I've not taken the jacket out for a ride in the rain yet, and that might influence my review, i.e. if it leaks, that's going to knock off a star or two. I first ordered a 'Small' according to the measurements, but it was too tight around my arms, so I returned it for a 'Medium'. The front zipper and main pocket zippers are rubberized - very nice ! - , but there are zippers beneath the arms you can open for more ventilation, and those don't have rubberization. Overall this Jacket feels comfortable, the back vent provides some airflow despite the seemingly non-breathable material. The reflexivity is quite astounding. I hope it hold up !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made for pear shaped people.
customer_reviews.text: My jacket just came. I pretty much where a large in all jackets. 50% of the responses say "Fit as expected". But this is really tight, almost binding in the chest and shoulders, but has a big roomy belly. Why do they make an athletic jacket for a pear shaped person?
customer_reviews.author: JahStrong

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Very visible. Because it is a raincoat, it doesn't really breath even with the vents open so it's only suitable for light activities in warm weather, but it is absolutely perfect for winter nights.
customer_reviews.author: Honcho

customer_reviews.title: For night riders everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Xmas gift for bike mad son, who bikes in dark, rain, etc. He loved it AND it really really works. Impossible to believe how bright it looks in headlights at night. My daughter-in-law sleeps easier. Yes, it is a tad pricey. But what's your life worth? My son appreciated a LOT of details on this jacket that I didn't even notice -- including vents and long tail.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Stanton

customer_reviews.title: I've been running with it now for three months. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been running with it now for three months. Works well when the temperature is below 40°F. Very reflective. Does not breathe. The reflective coating flakes off some parts of the jacket. A bit blousy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!
customer_reviews.text: The jacket helps alert drivers to my presence on the road. It does not vent as advertised, so be aware when considering purchasing this jacket. I have found that once the weather dips below 50 degrees it's fairly comfortable to wear without feeling too warm or stuffy.
customer_reviews.author: real CA beans

customer_reviews.title: Great Reflective Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these jackets and gave then to my BIKE RIDING family members. I noticed when I drive in bad light (sundown or rainy day) that bike riders wearing this jacket reflect light and are 100% visible to drivers and walkers. Really GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Super visible
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is perfect for fall and spring cycling. Really reflects so you can be seen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reflection works
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves fit my USA standard the chest is small if you wear a think item under you cannot cross your hand. It is not water proof. The collar if not zip up makes you look like you wearing a Elvis shirt
customer_reviews.author: Elmo W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing jacket...as promised!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing jacket! I bought it for my husband when he goes riding at times when it's dark. It is exactly as shown on the demo video. Well worth the money and gives us both peace of mind when he's out riding that he will be WELL SEEN by drivers on the road.
customer_reviews.author: A-Bear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Have recommended this product to a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Have recommended this product to a couple friends & they love it as well. It does tend to get warm has no problem keeping you warm at all. It's a good conversation piece & wonderful to wear at nite. The only real complaint is it's too bright. Solid coat would recommend it to anyone cycling!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise nice high-vis jacket
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a hood. Otherwise nice high-vis jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan D. Uslick

customer_reviews.title: GREAT visibility at night/dusk/dawn riding
customer_reviews.text: GREAT visibility at night/dusk/dawn riding. vents work well although it is hot if you're not in cooler weather. but recommend this to anyone that wants to make sure they are seen in low light riding times!!
customer_reviews.author: B.P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice jacket! I ordered one size bigger as to accommodate layering. Possibly will buy another later.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rolph

customer_reviews.title: The large felt like a US medium
customer_reviews.text: I would order a larger size. The large felt like a US medium.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is great. It vents well and is highly visible in ...
customer_reviews.text: While I never run in heavy traffic, I do run after work. Quite often it is in the dark. This jacket is great. It vents well and is highly visible in low light and in light reflected from oncoming traffic.
customer_reviews.author: J. DavidMcGirt

customer_reviews.title: Jacket is perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was a gift and was perfect. The reflective material was as just as described and the size was perfect. My son is a bodybuilder and I was worried tha it might be too small but he is able to wear a sweater or sweat shirt underneath and be quite warm! I no longer worry that drivers will not see him when hes riding!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Carter, Jr

customer_reviews.title: It is indeed *that* reflective.
customer_reviews.text: It glows in the dark. I kid you not. The fit is a little loose for cycling wear and it feels as if it would present a breath-ability problem (but I don't have good first-hand basis for complaint on that score). But the purpose was being seen and oh boy is it visible, with the most faint and indirect of lighting. Must look funny to cars to see the headless-legless humanoid floating down the shoulder of a dark road.
customer_reviews.author: mamil

customer_reviews.title: This a great light weight cycling jacket for high visibility
customer_reviews.text: This a great light weight cycling jacket for high visibility. It is not high technology for breathability but you will be seen at any time of the day or night (if light shines on you at night).
customer_reviews.author: Omac

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you visible...
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for cycling during the evening hour and great chance to remain visible warmer water resistant not breathable but it has armpit zipper to remain cool. Overall great jacket
customer_reviews.author: Bautnyc

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate
customer_reviews.text: The small is way too big, and the xsmall is way too small. The reflectivity is great on these jackets, but the odd fit is enough of an issue with these for me to return and go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not the jacket that is pictured. I ordered an ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the jacket that is pictured. I ordered an XL and what came is what seems to be an already used jacket complete with a screw in the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing 360 degree reflectivity is a must during the fall and winter commutes.
customer_reviews.author: joshhan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket, nice and visible
customer_reviews.text: I used my jacket for the 1st time at mardi gras it was excellent.. very visible I caught alot of beads
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Odem

customer_reviews.title: I get compliments on this jacket while riding
customer_reviews.text: I get about one compliment on my jacket per every two hours of riding my bike at night. People want to know where I got it, what it's called. They tell out that they can really see me, or just tell out thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price. FeEl my son is safe wearing it at night on scooter. Would recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice to know this in advance so I could order ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an extra large, and found it to be way too small, even though that is my normal size. It seems these sizes are Asian sizes and not US sizes. It would be nice to know this in advance so I could order a size at least 2 sizes larger. Returned this and purchased a different coat.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W Bovaird

customer_reviews.title: now my buddy has a nice jacket.
customer_reviews.text: shimmery and darned bright at night.. but the sizing is UK vs US and the seller dosn't return emails, so I missed the return window... now my buddy has a nice jacket. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality,  price and reflective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to run in during winter in Oregon. It certainly works. I've received many compliments on how reflective it is. You don't notice it looking down at it while wearing. It just looks gray. The material is stiffer than other nylon running jackets I own. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my fiancé, and she raves about it! The jacket is heavier than a rain shell, but still light enough to make riding easy. The jacket explodes with light when light hits it. It has reinforced seams, and pit zips. A fantastic jacket!
customer_reviews.author: James P Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: It more than glows in the dark when light is shined on it, it reflects light back!!1
customer_reviews.author: walkingwomen

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is pretty warm. I wouldn't wear it over 60F
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is pretty warm. I wouldn't wear it over 60F. However below this temp it is quite comfortable. Can't miss it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning material. Not an athletic fit. Far too ...
customer_reviews.text: Stunning material. Not an athletic fit. Far too much material in the midsection - jacket hangs in the stomach almost a foot when leaning over the handlebars. Jacket runs very warm, ventilation helps, but wouldn't wear above 50F.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, looks so cool and keeps my husband visible and safe on his bike at night. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CaliReader

customer_reviews.title: Maximum visibility at night and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Maximum visibility at night. Design is modern and very sporty. Waterproof need you ride in the rain and vents keep body cool as you ride. Recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: RikkiRoll

customer_reviews.title: Visibility
customer_reviews.text: This is a threat jacket that makes you very visible while riding.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket but sized too small
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice jacket and appropriately priced. I thought that it was sized too small. I am 73" and 193 pounds and wear a size 48 suit coat. I initially ordered an XL but it was too tight across the shoulders. Fortunately, Amazon's exchange policy is completely painless!
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: amazing.
customer_reviews.text: this is amazing, fits as expected, as soon as i received it i started wearing it while cycling , and people keep stopping me to know where i get it from. The only "problem" was the delivery, it took almost like a month, but it is worth the waiting. :D
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo S.

customer_reviews.title: The reflection on this baby is no joke and the price is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest getting one size up. The reflection on this baby is no joke and the price is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: I am NY

customer_reviews.title: An optical marvel. Place this jacket at the end ...
customer_reviews.text: An optical marvel. Place this jacket at the end of a dark corridor and see how it lights up. I am dead impressed by the reflective quality. Before considering anything else, read up on the "looked but did no see" literature. I will not commute with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Wow Visibility
customer_reviews.text: Incredible reflective quality. It doesn't breathe very well, but when I bike I sweat anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: (arms are still at tiny bit long but I'm happy with them)
customer_reviews.text: 6 foot. Long arms. 210lbs. The XXL is the right size for me. (arms are still at tiny bit long but I'm happy with them). Have not yet used. Really love the quality so far. Proper fit. Proper style. Really excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great for visibility
customer_reviews.text: very heavy for warmer weather but great for visibility. would love it even more if it were more windbreaker thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Highlen

customer_reviews.title: great visibility, not so great comfort
customer_reviews.text: super reflective. pretty much 100% visibility when I wear it at night. I found it cut very tight, especially around the arms, not giving me full range of motion. Also this jacket doesn't breathe at all, so I'm considering ripping up the side seams and sewing in some mesh for breathability. But I'd rather be safe than comfortable, so I'm very glad I purchased this for my nighttime jaunts.
customer_reviews.author: The Rocketdyke.

customer_reviews.title: Be Seen At Night
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Fits nice and is very comfortable. The vents in front along with full venting in back keeps the air flowing on warm nights. If I need more warmth in cooler months it has enough roominess to wear a warmer layer underneath. Everyone says I light up at night and can be seen from a mile away. Four-wheelers would have to be driving with their eyes closed to say they didn't see me. I feel more secure riding at night on my Harley.
customer_reviews.author: Boatman

customer_reviews.title: Shine bright
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Keeps my peace of mind going back home at night. It's fit a little bit larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: DOS

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept of this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this jacket. However, it is not waterproof, as advertised. After 30 minutes of riding in the rain, my entire body was soaked.
customer_reviews.author: iea

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bad: I wore it less than two weeks (1 hour running and 1 hour biking each day) and had not even washed yet and the jacket developed multiple small tears under the armpits and on the sleeves where the fabric bends. In other spots the reflective material fell off of the outside of the jacket. Good: It was very reflective. I felt very sure that cars were able to see me in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Nelson

product_meta.title: Proviz Reflect360 Mens Cycling Jacket
product_meta.description: New for Fall 2014....The REFLECT360 cycling jacket is the world's first to be designed using a 100% reflective outer-shell. The jacket's high quality material is designed to look and feel great while keeping the weather out. The reflective ability of the material helps other road users to identify a cyclist's position on the road at night giving them an extra few seconds of time to react and manoeuvre appropriately. The REFLECT360 jacket incorporates multiple vents - front, shoulder/back and under arm. This allows the user to regulate body temperature. By opening the front zipper vents a 'through-flow' is achieved. The air enters the front vents, cools the body and exits via the shoulder/back vents. During the winter, the vents can be closed and are designed to also be used as extra pockets if required. These features enable the jacket to be used all year round. The jacket also has an inside chest pocket and large lower back pocket to store an extra layers or a map.
feature_bullets: The Times: "Offers incredible reflectivity" -- The REFLECT360 cycling jacket is the world's first to be designed using a 100% reflective outer-shell. The jacket's high quality material is designed to look and feel great while keeping the weather out.

Utilising millions of tiny, highly reflective glass beads, the innovative material used for the REFLECT360 Cycling Jacket is exceptionally waterproof (5,000mm) and has taped inner seams to prevent water getting in at sewing lines

The REFLECT360 Cycling Jacket has a soft cotton mesh lining which acts as a climate control mechanism. The mesh increases airflow by maintaining separation between your skin/shirt and the outer layer of the jacket

100% Waterproof, built in air vents to keep ventilated, Fleece-lined comfort collar, Adjustable waistband and velcro cuff, Waterproof storm zip, Seam-sealed, inside pockets, rear spray guard, Inside mesh lining for added comfort, Approx weight, 500g

The jacket's high quality material is designed to look and feel great while keeping the weather out. During daylight the jacket is a modest grey colour. At night, it gives ‘astonishing reflectivity’ The material is CE EN 20471 certified.
Waterproof (seam-sealed) and built in air vents to keep ventilated (front, under-arm and shoulder/back)
